snippet.title: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse Season Trailer [with Episode 5 Preview]
snippet.description:
Available now on PSN and PC/Mac!

PSN: http://bit.ly/XP6Wj2
PC/Mac:http://bit.ly/9Fn3WY

Here's the teaser for Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse, which recaps all four released episodes and also teases Episode 5: The City that Dares Not Sleep!

An otherworldly power for controlling matter and space calls to the strongest and strangest who might wield it -- intergalactic warlords and eldritch gods, under-dwellers and scholars of the arcane.

Gaming's greatest dog and rabbit sleuths Sam & Max seek the power's ancient secrets, as manic Max gains shape shifting, teleportation, mind reading and future vision abilities for battling these foes.


Website: http://www.telltalegames.com/samandmax
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/telltalegames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/telltalegames
